name: dmvolss

stmt.origin: mpbir(wss(cdm(cvol), cpw(cr)), wral(hs0, cdm(cvol), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cr))))

body.origin:
|- wss(cdm(cvol), cpw(cr))
-| wral(hs0, cdm(cvol), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cr)))
-| wb(wss(cdm(cvol), cpw(cr)), wral(hs0, cdm(cvol), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cr))))
body.pretty:
⊢ dom(vol)⊆ P(ℝ)
⊣ ∀(hs0 ∈ dom(vol), hs0 ∈ P(ℝ))
⊣ (dom(vol)⊆ P(ℝ)↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ dom(vol), hs0 ∈ P(ℝ)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cr)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))

body.pretty:
⊢ (hs0 ∈ dom(vol)→ hs0 ∈ P(ℝ))
⊣ (hs0 ∈ dom(vol)→ hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
⊣ (hs0 ∈ dom(vol)→ hs0 ⊆ ℝ)

|- wb(wss(cdm(cvol), cpw(cr)), wral(hs0, cdm(cvol), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cr))))

comment: Lebesgue measurable sets are subsets of Real numbers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
